title: How easy is it to pass 1st sem exams ?
content: I got around 23-30 in internals and need around 20-35 in ESA to not get a backlog, so what I am trying to ask is will the evaluators give grace marks if one scores 3-7 marks less than what's needed to pass exams ?

comments.body:
did u not write isa?  
how do u know ur internal marks already?
if ur internals are good it is really easy,thats what everyone says including teachers write ur worksheets and case studies properly and do not skip them
If you need like a couple of marks to pass, they will pass you, but like 7M, i certainly don't think so
I wrote ISA, it's already there in pesuacademy
